source.dad3b105:
actress_age_avg =  df.groupby(['film_release_year'],as_index=False).actress_age.mean()
from matplotlib.pyplot import figure
figure(figsize=(10, 10), dpi=80)
plt.plot(actress_age_avg['film_release_year'],actress_age_avg['actress_age'], color='red')
plt.show()

source.c094d2bf:
from matplotlib.pyplot import figure
figure(figsize=(10, 10), dpi=80)
plt.scatter(df['actress_age'], df['bond_actor_age'], color='black')
plt.xlabel("Actress Age")
plt.ylabel("Actor Age")
plt.show()
